author: acmurthy
msg: MAPREDUCE-3256. Added authorization checks for the protocol between NodeManager and ApplicationMaster. Contributed by Vinod K V.

author: veithen
msg: Bootstrap OpenSAML when the Rampart module is initialized, so that the success of the test suite no longer depends on the order in which the tests are executed.

author: pmuellr
msg: another flavor of element highlighter using 2 divs
Also refactored the highlighter to make it easy to swap

author: pmuellr
msg: Try another version of the element highlighter
This version use a set of divs added to a container, four for each
margin, border, padding, plus one for content.  All direct
children of the container, and then arranged to the correct
Downside of this technique is that the seams between the
divs show through in some zoom settings.
